title: Champ Select keeps freezing
body:
Happens probably every 1-3 champ select sometimes it can happen for more than 2 consecutive champ selects. I get this bug (Champ Select freezing) and it's getting really frustrating because sometimes i am in my series and every time this bug happens i lose my series also when i am in solo/duo rank queue i lose 3-10 LP because of this stupid bug and a queue dodge timer. Does anybody have a solution?

I've tried:
Porting my IP
Hextech Repair
Re-installing

replies.body:
Are your graphics drivers up to date?
Are you running any other programs that may be interfacing with League?
When you reinstalled did you do a clean reinstall through the Hextech Repair Tool or just a regular OS uninstall?
Is there an unusual amount of CPU or RAM usage during champ select? (Right click task bar/ctrl alt del > Task Manager > Performance)

Yeah my drivers r up to date.I have dual monitors so while i queue up for my next game or while i wait for my turn to select my champ i watch youtube or twitch streams.
Yes i did the clean -reinstall
Not sure

Hmm I'm afraid I can't think of anything else that might be causing your issue, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support, they're much more well versed in this than I am.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
